name: class?: string
description: CSS class for the tooltip component.

name: colors?: string
description: Defines the color palette for the tooltip.

name: variant?: string
description: Specifies the variant style of the tooltip.

name: position?: string
description: Position of the tooltip relative to the target element.

name: offset?: number
description: Offset distance between the tooltip and the target element.

name: withArrow?: boolean
description: Determines if the tooltip includes an arrow pointing to the target element.

name: tooltipContent: string | Snippet
description: Content to be displayed inside the tooltip.

name: children: Snippet
description: Elements that trigger or are associated with the tooltip.

name: open?: boolean
description: Indicates whether the tooltip is open or closed.

name: animationFunction?: SvelteTransitionFn
description: Function to handle the tooltip's opening and closing animation.

name: animationParams?: any
description: Parameters for the tooltip's animation function.
